summary: Comprehensive monthly event log aligned to Wikipedia 2025 coverage; includes politics, conflicts, climate, tech, sports, and culture milestones.

events.event: 2025 Australian federal election : The incumbent Labor Party led
events.details: 2025 Australian federal election : The incumbent Labor Party led by Anthony Albanese wins reelection, increasing their majority

events.event: 2025 Malian protests : Hundreds of demonstrators gather in Bamako
events.details: 2025 Malian protests : Hundreds of demonstrators gather in Bamako , Mali , to protest the government 's proposed dissolution of political parties and extension of president Assimi Goïta 's mandate by 5 years

events.event: 2025 Singaporean general election : The incumbent People's Action Party
events.details: 2025 Singaporean general election : The incumbent People's Action Party led by Lawrence Wong wins reelection in a landslide, retaining a supermajority government

events.event: The protests mark the first pro-democracy demonstrations in the country
events.details: The protests mark the first pro-democracy demonstrations in the country since the regime took power in 2021

events.event: 2025 German federal election : Friedrich Merz is elected Chancellor
events.details: 2025 German federal election : Friedrich Merz is elected Chancellor of Germany in the second round of parliamentary voting, hours after being defeated in the first round, a first in post- WWII German history

events.event: 2025 India–Pakistan conflict : India launches several missiles into Pakistani
events.details: 2025 India–Pakistan conflict : India launches several missiles into Pakistani territory in response to the 2025 Pahalgam attack two weeks prior

events.event: 8 – 2025 conclave : 133 cardinal electors elect Robert
events.details: 8 – 2025 conclave : 133 cardinal electors elect Robert Francis Prevost as Pope Francis 's successor, on the fourth ballot

events.event: He takes the name Pope Leo XIV , and becomes
events.details: He takes the name Pope Leo XIV , and becomes the first pope from North America, the first with Peruvian or U

events.event: S
events.details: S

events.event: citizenship, and the first from the Order of Saint Augustine
events.details: citizenship, and the first from the Order of Saint Augustine

events.event: 25 – The 2025 IIHF World Championship is held in
events.details: 25 – The 2025 IIHF World Championship is held in Stockholm , Sweden, and Herning , Denmark, and is won by the United States

events.event: 2025 Albanian parliamentary election : The incumbent Socialist Party led
events.details: 2025 Albanian parliamentary election : The incumbent Socialist Party led by Edi Rama wins reelection, retaining a majority government

events.event: 2025 Philippine general election : The ruling Alyansa para sa
events.details: 2025 Philippine general election : The ruling Alyansa para sa Bagong Pilipinas alliance win a narrow majority of the seats in the Senate , while one of its component parties Lakas–CMD wins the plurality of seats in the House of Representatives

events.event: The Kurdistan Workers' Party announces its dissolution after previously declaring
events.details: The Kurdistan Workers' Party announces its dissolution after previously declaring a ceasefire with Turkey

events.event: 17 – The Eurovision Song Contest 2025 is held in
events.details: 17 – The Eurovision Song Contest 2025 is held in Basel , Switzerland

events.event: Austrian contestant JJ wins with the song " Wasted Love
events.details: Austrian contestant JJ wins with the song " Wasted Love "

events.event: 2025 Portuguese legislative election : The incumbent Social Democratic Party
events.details: 2025 Portuguese legislative election : The incumbent Social Democratic Party led by Luís Montenegro wins an increased plurality , but fails to achieve a majority

events.event: 2025 Romanian presidential election : Following the annulment of the
events.details: 2025 Romanian presidential election : Following the annulment of the previous election , Bucharest mayor Nicușor Dan wins in the second round, beating George Simion

events.event: The 2025 Surinamese general election is held
events.details: The 2025 Surinamese general election is held

events.event: The 2025 Venezuelan parliamentary election is held
events.details: The 2025 Venezuelan parliamentary election is held

events.event: Josep-Lluís Serrano Pentinat is sworn in as the new Episcopal
events.details: Josep-Lluís Serrano Pentinat is sworn in as the new Episcopal Co-Prince of Andorra and Bishop of Urgell after the Vatican accepts the resignation of Joan Enric Vives i Sicília for age limitation reasons
